name: IMMZ.DT.16.Meningococcal
description: If child or person has not been vaccinated, give Meningococcal vaccine according to the defined schedule

action.title: Immunize Patient for Meningococcal- No Doses
action.description: Provide Meningococcal immunizations – using the "MenA conjugate vaccine (5µg) immunization – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (1 dose scheme)

expression.description: "Meningococcal vaccine immunization history" = "No doses and between 9 to 18 months old"
expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient with MenA conjugate vaccine (5µg)

action.title: Immunize Patient for Meningococcal- No Doses
action.description: Provide Meningococcal immunizations – using the "MenA conjugate vaccine (5µg) immunization – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (2 dose scheme)

expression.description: "Meningococcal vaccine immunization history" = "No doses and there is a compelling reason to vaccinate infants between 3 to 9 months old"
expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient with MenA conjugate vaccine (5µg)

action.title: Immunize Patient for Meningococcal- 1 Dose
action.description: Provide Meningococcal immunizations – using the "MenA conjugate vaccine (5µg) immunization – 1 PREVIOUS" schedule (2 dose scheme)

expression.description: "Meningococcal vaccine immunization history" = "1 dose given 8 weeks before and and there is a compelling reason to vaccinate infants between 3 to 9 months old"
expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient with MenA conjugate vaccine (5µg)

action.title: Immunize Patient for Meningococcal- No Doses
action.description: Provide Meningococcal immunizations – using the "monovalent MenC conjugate vaccine immunization – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (1 dose scheme)

expression.description: "Meningococcal vaccine immunization history" = "No dose and greater than or equal to 12 months and teenager and adult"
expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient with monovalent MenC conjugate vaccine

action.title: Immunize Patient for Meningococcal- No Doses
action.description: Provide Meningococcal immunizations – using the "monovalent MenC conjugate vaccine immunization – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (2 dose scheme)

expression.description: "Meningococcal vaccine immunization history" = "No dose and between 2 to 11 months old"
expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient with monovalent MenC conjugate vaccine

action.title: Immunize Patient for Meningococcal- 1 Dose
action.description: Provide Meningococcal immunizations – using the "monovalent MenC conjugate vaccine immunization – 1 PREVIOUS" schedule (2 dose scheme)

expression.description: "Meningococcal vaccine immunization history" = "1 dose given 2 months before and between 2 to 11 months old"
expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient with monovalent MenC conjugate vaccine

action.title: Immunize Patient for Meningococcal- No Doses
action.description: Provide Meningococcal immunizations – using the "Quadrivalent conjugate vaccines (A,C,W135,Y-D and A,C,W135,Y-CRM) immunization – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (1 dose scheme)

expression.description: "Meningococcal vaccine immunization history" = "No dose greater than or equal to 2 years old"
expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient with Quadrivalent conjugate vaccines (A,C,W135,Y-D and A,C,W135,Y-CRM)

action.title: Immunize Patient for Meningococcal- No Doses
action.description: Provide Meningococcal immunizations – using the "Quadrivalent conjugate vaccines (A,C,W135,Y-D) immunization – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (2 dose scheme)

expression.description: "Meningococcal vaccine immunization history" = "No dose and between 9 and 23 months old"
expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient with Quadrivalent conjugate vaccines (A,C,W135,Y-D)

action.title: Immunize Patient for Meningococcal- 1 Dose
action.description: Provide Meningococcal immunizations – using the "Quadrivalent conjugate vaccines (A,C,W135,Y-D) immunization – 1 PREVIOUS" schedule (2 dose scheme)

expression.description: "Meningococcal vaccine immunization history" = "1 dose given 3 months before and between 9 and 23 months old"
expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient with Quadrivalent conjugate vaccines (A,C,W135,Y-D)

action.title: Immunize Patient for Meningococcal- No Doses
action.description: Provide Meningococcal immunizations – using the "Meningococcal polysaccharide vaccines immunization – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (1 dose scheme)

expression.description: "Meningococcal vaccine immunization history" = "No dose  and  greater than or equal to 2 years old"
expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient with Meningococcal polysaccharide vaccines
